author: Brian in Mesa
title: Taxi
text: Genre: Comedy, Documentary Starring: Jafar Panahi Plot Summary: A yellow cab drives through the vibrant and colorful streets of Tehran, picking up a diverse group of passengers who each candidly express their opinions and worldview to the driver - none other than Panahi himself. In a lithe series of interactions that are, by turns, comedic, touching and illuminating, his camera placed on the dashboard of his mobile film studio, Panahi captures the spirit of Iranian society as he travels through the streets of the city he loves and is not allowed to leave.
